delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
delete-explained: Deleting your account will permanently remove all of your data and activity from Kronikea, including your profile, stories, characters, locations and comments. You will no longer be able to access your account or use any of the app's features. Please note that this action is irreversible. If you're certain that you want to proceed, please type your password and click the "Confirm" button. This will permanently delete your account and all associated data. Alternatively, if you don't want to delete your account, you can simply close this window or click the "Cancel" button to return to the app. We're sorry to see you go. If you have any feedback or suggestions for how we can improve Kronikea, please let us know. We appreciate your support and hope to see you again in the future.
empty-stories: Nothing to see here for the moment
enter-password-to-delete: Please enter your password to delete your account
privacy-explained: When this option is available, the other users can't see your Favorites tab on your profile
private-2: To make it public, click on the Settings icon, and then select the Security tab and uncheck "Make my Favorites tab private" under Privacy
private-message: does not wish to share there favorites with the world
private-tab-1: Your Favorites tab is private. Only you can see it.
set-password: Do you want to set a password
private-fav: Your 'Favorites' panel is in Private mode. No one else can see it. To switch to 'Public' mode, go to the 'Security' section of your Settings.
